Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Aparthotel Tropical in Puerto de la Cruz, you'll be near the beach and minutes from Plaza del Charco and Ermita de San Juan. This hotel is within close proximity of Church of Nuestra Senora de la Pena de Francia and Risco Belle Aquatic Gardens.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 35 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include phones and safes, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Aparthotel Tropical. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, laundry facilities, and an elevator (lift). A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Aparthotel Tropical. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

When you stay at Aparthotel Tropical in Puerto de la Cruz, you'll be near the beach and minutes from Plaza del Charco and Ermita de San Juan. This hotel is within close proximity of Church of Nuestra Senora de la Pena de Francia and Risco Belle Aquatic Gardens.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Plaza del Charco - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Ermita de San Juan - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Church of Nuestra Senora de la Pena de Francia - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Risco Belle Aquatic Gardens - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Taoro Park - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Sitio Litre Garden - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Castillo San Felipe - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Garden Beach - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Casino Puerto de la Cruz - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Lago Martianez Swimming Pools - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Mirador de La Paz - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Loro Parque - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Botanical Garden of La Orotava - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Pueblo Chico - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Bollullo Beach - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi

The preferred airport for Aparthotel Tropical is Santa Cruz de Tenerife (TFN-Tenerife North) - 21.6 km / 13.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
